description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Puzzle DeFusion is a fast paced Puzzle game with a unique blend of intense gameplay, music and special effects that will get your heart pounding.  Create Connection lines to match the color blocks.  Match the sparking Defusion blocks to detonate the puzzle and move on to the next level. Sound easy, it’s not!
